admin.title: MCP Server
admin.configuration-note: MCP Server configuration will be available in future versions.
admin.description: The MCP (Model Context Protocol) Server provides an interface for AI models to interact with NodeBB.
admin.current-features: Current implementation includes basic health checking functionality. Additional features will be added in future versions.

oauth.title: Authorisation Required
oauth.client_request: The following application is requesting permissions:
oauth.security_notice: By approving, this application will be able to perform the specified actions on your behalf.

scope.mcp:read: Read Access - View content and information
scope.mcp:write: Write Access - Modify and create data
